Module: scenes

Scene API. Almost every routine requires an active scene to be set, use get_active() set_active() to do that.
Source:
  • ext/scenes.js, line 3

Members

(static, constant) DATA_ID_ALL

All possible data IDs.
Source:
  • ext/scenes.js, line 19

Methods

(static) apply_glow_anim(obj, tau, T, N)

Apply glowing animation to the object
Parameters:
Name Type Description
obj Object Object ID
tau Number Glowing duration
T Number Period of glowing
N Number Number of relapses (0 - infinity)
